item.title: 17 Mistakes Self-Taught Programmers and Developers Make When Learning to code
item.description: I want to start by saying that if you took the initiative to start learning to code, you should pat yourself on the back.

item.title: Balancing a full-time job while learning to code
item.description: If you really want something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t you’ll find an excuse.

item.title: Want To Be a Programmer? Stop Overthinking It.
item.description: Which path to take? A path. A programmer is someone who programs.

item.title: #100Devs Software Engineering Bootcamp
item.description: Check out my Youtube videos about 100Devs: How to join 100Devs and What is 100Devs
